絺字的基本解释

絺
chī
细葛布。
细葛布做的衣服。
古邑名，中国春秋时的周地，故址在今河南省沁阳县西南。
姓。

絺
zhǐ
刺绣。
喻修饰文词。

絺字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chī］
［《廣韻》丑飢切，平脂，徹。］
(1)细葛布。
(2)古邑名。故地在今河南省沁阳县西南。
(3)姓。春秋晋有絺疵。见《姓氏急就篇》。
[②]［zhǐ］
［《集韻》展几切，上旨，知。］
通“黹1”。

絺字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【糸字部】　絺； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页924第22
【廣韻】丑飢切【集韻】抽遲切，?音郗。【說文】細葛也。【書·益稷】黼黻絺繡。【傳】葛之精者曰絺。【詩·周南】爲絺爲綌。【疏】煮葛以爲絺綌。【禮·曲禮】爲天子削瓜者副之巾以絺。【疏】細葛爲巾。　又【正韻】抽知切，音摛。義同。　又地名。【左傳·隱十一年註】絺在野王縣西南。　又姓。【姓氏急就篇】周有絺邑。以邑爲氏。晉智伯臣有絺疵。　又【集韻】展几切。黹或作絺。 考證：〔【左傳·隱十一年註】絺在野里縣西南。〕　謹照原文野里改野王。

絺字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
絺字的起名意思

暂无。

linen
Basic explanation of words
linen
chī
Fine Gebu.
Clothes made of fine Gebu.
The name of the ancient town, the Zhoudi in the Spring and Autumn Period of China, the former site is in the southwest of Qinyang County, Henan Province.
name.
linen
zhǐ
embroidery.
Yu modifies literary words.
linen
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chī］
["Guangyun" is ugly and hungry, flat fat and thorough. ]
(1) Fine Gebu.
(2) The name of the ancient town. The hometown was in the southwest of Qinyang County, Henan Province.
(3) Last name. There are flaws in the Spring and Autumn Period. See "Surname Anxiety Chapter".
[②]［zhǐ］
["Ji Yun" show a few cuts, the purpose, know. ]
Same as "Hun 1".
linen
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not concentrated] [Shizi Department] 　絺; Kangxi strokes: 13; Page number: page 924 22
[Guang Yun] Ugly Hungry Cut [Ji Yun] Late cut,? Yin Xi. [Said the text] Xi Ge also. 【Book·Yiji】Embroidery. [Biography] Ge Zhijing said 絺. 【Poetry·Zhou Nan】It is 絺絺綌. 【Sparse】Cooking Ge thought to be 絺綌. 【Ritual·Courtesy】For the emperor who cuts melons, the scarf is used as a sash. 【Sparse】Xia Ge is a towel.　[Zheng Yun] Pick up knowledge and cut, and sound. The same meaning.　Also place name. [Zuo Zhuan·Hidden Eleventh Year Note] Yu is in the southwest of Yewang County.　Another last name. [Surname Anxiety Chapter] Zhouyou Yiyi. Take Yap as the clan. Jin Zhi Bochen has flaws.　 [Ji Yun] Show a few cuts.黹 or 絺. Textual research: [[Zuo Zhuan · Yin eleven years note] Yu is in the southwest of Yeli County. 〕　I would like to change the wild king according to the original text.
